title: YouTube direct video sharing now available on Snapchat for Android
content:
After adding the ability to share your current YouTube Music playlist or track, you’re now able to directly share YouTube videos to Snapchat for Android and iOS.

more…

The post YouTube direct video sharing now available on Snapchat for Android appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After adding YouTube Music sharing, you're now able to directly share YouTube videos to Snapchat for Android and iOS.
